Various value adding services that create wealth and help customers/SMB realize unseen or unrecognized markets, through marketing, process, product and marketing.

This position allows for a strong customer focus driving successful outcomes by supporting stakeholders, gathering needs to develop and deliver new products to the forefront of the Godaddy's DIFM Website/Ecomm product offering.  Pushing for customer success and experience.  Measure NPS/CSS and Ease of use to gauge and improve customer experience, drive initiatives, then meet with stakeholders regarding product/process improvement  and implement solutions.  Follow-up with continuous improvement loop.  Focused on CAaS for the future of Client success & the ROI of marketing spend.  Responsible for helping  SMB establish and flourish in an increasingly difficult to navigate webscape, while ensuring that our current product set is relevant and leads to desired outcomes. Emphasis on creating the platform to enable long term success for 'DIY/Get me started,' DIFM & DIWM customers by testing the marketplace for wins and ease of use, at the right price!

Responsible for leading a customer focused creative team of Graphic Designers, Writers and Website Developers to scope, create & deliver Kick-Ass Websites helping small business clientele succeed.  We are a passionate group of innovators who define what it is to be excellent every day at a rate of 40 sites per day, sporting a 54% Net Promoter Score (NPS)! Mainly focused on SMB Success by leaning into current design trends with easy to manage projects for the DIFM, DIY and DIWM. (Do It With Me) markets, utilizing; HTML, CSS, Java-Script, ECOMM & SEO to drive growth. Secondarily focused on helping develop and deliver new products to the forefront of the Design Team's offering to drive customer success and experience.  NPS is instrument by which I gauge success.

Responsible for leading a team of Project Managers in a high volume/fast paced environment where quality and customer experience are paramount.  Increased throughput at 28% year over year to keep pace as the department.  Also, helped improve process and platforms to increasingly delight internal & external customer's.  Began measuring NPS/CSS.

July 17, 2016, Jeffrey managed Constantine (Chevy) directly

I've worked with Constantine (Chevy) for long enough to understand his commitment to excellence.  One of the traits I find admirable is his ability to focus, never missing deadlines while being open to helping others.  Chevy is an amazing resource that I've always relied on to give the extra 10% to pull the team forward. He's a pleasure to work with and I'd hire him again for any position he applied for.  I know that if he commits the work is in good hands. His Skillset is ever evolving with the adaptability needed to grow with our solution's needs  overall Chevy is one of the strongest developers I have ever worked with!

summary: Tenacious, curious, creative, and driven; words that often collide with the name Yahner.  I’ve spent my professional life passionately chasing success and knowledge, and discovered early, the value of Preparation, Collaboration, and Communication.                THINGS I'M PASSIONATE ABOUTAs the Father of a Twice-Exceptional student, I fight for those who give of themselves so that children on the spectrum, receive the help they need and are supported. I advocate for Educators and administrators alike but realize the best thing I can do for them is to educate myself and support the legislation that helps them most.  Beyond that and rallying folks around me to get out and vote, I have sleeves to roll up and a back to break helping in any way I can.                THE SKILLS I’LL BRING •	Entrepreneurial Spirit with 15+ years of ‘front line’ experience leading, partnering and implementing•	Well-honed Communication skills – interpersonal, leadership, collaboration, facilitation, and negotiation•	Customer Advocacy – ability to view initiatives through the lens of the client –  both internal and external•	CAaS – strong background & belief in Content As a Solution –  one of the most important offerings in the future of the Internet. •	Big Data Analysis (Hadoop/Tableau)  – Design & Mine to uncover needed information and historical trends•	Soft-Skills – from partnering to decision making, planning and practical application of concepts to real-world use •	People-Skills  – recruiting, onboarding, training, career-pathing, teambuilding, Situational Leadership Much of my career has been 'on location,' in new markets creating opportunity in an 'On Demand' world; uncovering client's needs on the fly.  I join forces with enthusiasm and take the time needed to step back and survey progress, laugh and smileI speak millennial yet I'm old enough to have used a rotary phone, but young enough to wear a Mohawk since the turn of the century.  (The most recent turn :-)
